questionTitle: Which of the following provides a bridge between a company’s existing network and the AWS cloud?
questionExplanation:
VPC connects your network resources to a set of AWS systems over a Virtual Private Network (VPN) connection and extends security
systems.

questionOption1: Between FBA and FWS, you can create a nearly virtual store on Amazon.com
questionOption2: Amazon plans to extend the capabilities of VPC to integrate with other systems in the Amazon cloud computing portfolio
questionOption3: FPS is exposed as an API that sorts transactions into packages called Quick Starts that makes it easy to implement
questionExplanation: Merchant inventory is prepositioned in Amazon’s fulfillment centers.

questionTitle: Which of the following is Amazon’s technical support and consulting business?
questionExplanation: Through AWS Premium Support, subscribers to AWS can get help building or supporting applications that use EC2.

questionTitle: Which of the following allows merchants to fill orders through Amazon.com fulfillment service?
questionExplanation: There is no charge for using Amazon FWS.

questionOption1: With EC2, you can launch and run server instances called Amazon Machine Images (AMIs) running different operating systems such as Red Hat Linux
questionOption2: A machine image is the software and operating system running on top of the instance
questionOption3: A machine image may be thought of as the contents of a boot drive
questionExplanation: A machine image should be composed of a hardened operating system.

questionTitle: Which of the following provides access for developers to charge Amazon’s customers for their purchases?
Which of the following uses an authentication device?
questionExplanation: Multi-Factor Authentication gives you two layers of protection: your user id and password.

questionTitle: _________ is a virtual server platform that allows users to create and run virtual machines on Amazon’s server farm.
questionExplanation: You can add or subtract virtual servers elastically as needed.

questionTitle: AMIs are operating systems running on the _____ virtualization hypervisor.
questionExplanation: Each virtual private server is accorded a size rating called its EC2 Compute Unit.

questionTitle: Which of the following instance class is best used for applications that are processor or compute-intensive?
questionExplanation: Applications of this type include rendering, encoding, data and others.
